mapper.select: SELECT a.board_id, a.board_type, a.board_title, a.board_content, a.user_id, fnc_timestamp(a.insert_dt) AS `insert`, a.insert_dt, a.update_dt, a.`status`, a.v_cnt, b.user_name, b.user_level, IFNULL(c.file_path, '/') AS file_path, GROUP_CONCAT(d.tag) AS tag FROM tbl_board a LEFT JOIN tbl_user b ON a.user_id = b.user_id LEFT JOIN tbl_file c ON a.user_id = c.file_ref_no AND c.file_type = 'PROFILE' LEFT JOIN tbl_board_tag d ON a.board_id = d.board_id WHERE a.board_type = #{boardType} AND a.status = #{status} GROUP BY a.board_id
